pasugiya wasara 15 thula pamanak nodiyunu ratawal wala, dusim ganan ho siyaganan ekawara maranayata pathkaramin kasala kandu aashrithawa siduwu dawantha wyasana 10 kata wada wartha wi atha. 1960 gana n wala itha simithawa ho widyathmaka ghana apadrawya kalamanakaranayak aarambha kara pawathi diyunu dhanapathi ratawala pawa, me wanawita kasala aashritha ugra gatalu pananagi athi athara, wadathma upadrawakaraka apadrawya diyunu ratawala sita nodiyunu ratawalata prawahagatha karana jalayakda godanagi athibawa mathaka sidukala adhyanayan heli karayi.
